author: Maria González
title: Book vs. Movie: The Great Gatsby
content: Fitzgerald’s novel is layered with symbolism and prose that the film adaptation can’t quite capture. Let’s dive into what makes the book a literary classic beyond its glitz and glamor.

author: Jane Smith
title: The Timeless Magic of Tolkien
content: J.R.R. Tolkien's works, especially The Lord of the Rings, continue to inspire generations. This post explores how his rich world-building and languages reshaped modern fantasy literature.

author: Diana Gabaldon
title: The Outlander
content: Outlander is a series of historical fantasy novels by American author Diana Gabaldon.
